thought: To craft a chiseled_red_sandstone, I need to place two red_sandstone_slab in the crafting grid. I have two red_sandstone_slab in my inventory, so I will move one from slot 13 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have one red_sandstone_slab in the crafting grid, I need to move the other one to the right of it. Slot 4 is to the right of slot 1, so I will move the red_sandstone_slab from slot 13 to slot 4.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 4 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
